duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver business value through identifying customer demands and achieving/exceeding revenue and deal win metrics.
Lead a team of Strategic Account Managers, ensuring 80% team achievement of targets and accurate forecasting.
Build a strong diverse team through talent recruitment, retention, and engagement, resulting in an overall PLI score of 90 or higher.
Create a sufficient pipeline of deals, understand and use SFDC for proactive selling, and drive an increased sales performance.
Focus the sales team on delivering against expectations, increase personal accountability, and provide input to other functions to deliver a better customer experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Previous leadership experience managing and motivating teams.
